name: Alifia Sayang
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Wishing you a day filled with happiness and a year filled with joy. Happy birthday!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy and bla bla bla...
text2: That's what I was going to do before.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
replayText: Tapi kalo kamu suka bisa klik lagi yak
